p: For the synthesis of norcantharimide derivatives ( 6 a– f), 2‐amino‐1 H‐4,7‐epoxyisoindole‐1,3(2 H)‐dione (4) were used as the key compound. This key compound was obtained by reaction of 3a, 4,7,7a‐tetrahydro‐4,7‐epoxyisobenzofuran‐1,3‐dione ( 3) with hydrazine hydrate in the presence of methyl alcohol. 3a,4,7,7a‐tetrahydro‐4,7‐epoxyisobenzofuran‐1,3‐dione ( 3) was prepared via an exo‐selective cycloaddition of furan and maleic anhydride (Scheme 1).
